headline: The BathyBeacon Work Continues
description: AI-assisted tinkering update: a breadboarded microcontroller drives eight LEDs and a piezo buzzer to play the nursery melody “Hot Cross Buns,” mapping notes to light steps. The BathyBeacon project explores simple, teachable translations between sound and light as a pocket totem for attention and play.
resonantThread: Totemic devices that translate modalities (sound ↔ light) and invite small daily making

motifMap.meaning: the mind of the totem; code as spirit
co-making with a model; rapid iteration

associatedMedia.description: Short video: breadboard with eight LEDs and a buzzer driven by a microcontroller; blue LED lit while the melody plays.
